name: 10 SECONDS TO DIE (lizardking260)
description:
🔥🔥🔥⚔️⚔️⚔️

10 Seconds to Die is a fast-paced Bullet Hell game where the  protagonist wields a slick sword allowing him to reflect enemy bullets. Fight waves of enemy to achieve a high score.

This game was created for Bullet Hell Jam 2021. Let me know what you think!

dis game is gas
